author: arnetheduck
content:

author: parithosh
content:
I dumped all the calls sent and received to the EL at the minute 5:49 (all calls have a valid response, errors are also logged), I do see on the EL that it has timed out:
```
INFO [08-04|05:49:02.391] Imported new potential chain segment     number=3092 hash=21ed5d..f98835 blocks=1 txs=0 mgas=0.000 elapsed="174.884µs" mgasps=0.000 dirty=0.00B
INFO [08-04|05:49:03.040] Chain head was updated                   number=3092 hash=21ed5d..f98835 root=55194a..8b7b96 elapsed="47.523µs"
INFO [08-04|05:49:03.040] Starting work on payload                 id=0x14769151758deda9
INFO [08-04|05:49:03.041] Updated payload                          id=0x14769151758deda9 number=3093 hash=d96321..61b171 txs=0 gas=0 fees=0 root=55194a..8b7b96 elapsed="48.083µs"
INFO [08-04|05:49:14.317] Stopping work on payload                 id=0x948c844eb136e482 reason=timeout
INFO [08-04|05:49:15.041] Stopping work on payload                 id=0x14769151758deda9 reason=timeout
INFO [08-04|05:49:21.042] Imported new potential chain segment     number=3093 hash=b16914..fbab84 blocks=1 txs=0 mgas=0.000 elapsed="119.973µs" mgasps=0.000 dirty=0.00B
```

The machine however isnt under load, so im struggling to see why its timing out. Additionally there's no tx load on the el side, so its got even less work to do.

author: parithosh
content: We'll be turning off the testnet in the next ~30mins. Let us know if you want to collect any last minute data!
